EmailTemplate.description: eBook: What Does the Rise of Digital Payments Really Mean for Cash?
EmailTemplate.name: 10-07-21 BNK SelfServe24 Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: As We Continue to Adapt, How is Cash Use Changing Around the World?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Despite a rise in digital, cash is still a preferred payment choice around the world. Simply look at the high cash-in-circulation levels over the last year—cash remains the go-to in a time of crisis. What’s more, the control, privacy, simplicity and immediacy of cash will always make it an important payment choice. But cash use is changing—and that affects FIs. Read our eBook to explore how cash use is evolving around the world and how you should adapt to it. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
